##Through a crack in the emergency tunnel

To-cure-sometimes

Function introduction, record people and disease, aging, death of the way.

In pain and despair, Liang Shutao committed suicide by falling from a building. Life ends at 14:57 on February 10,2020.

Between 1300 and 1500 hours on February 8, Liang Shutao, 70, wailed alone in a gated community service centre to arrange a nucleic acid test.

Uremia, suspected since January 27 since the new pneumonia can not be confirmed, must be a weekly routine dialysis, but also difficult to continue.

But the Community Liang Shutao received (Luojiadun, Gutian Street, Wuhan) as a solution, has been Foshan and so on.

After forensic examination, Liang Shutao's body was removed at about 2200 hours.

Earlier, at 21:09 and 21:32, Ma Guoqiang, the former secretary of the Wuhan Municipal Party Committee, stressed at the Prevention and control press conference: As of February 9, the number of people who had completed the nationwide health screening was 99 percent; by the 11th, achieve "zero out" of all suspected patient tests.

The death of Liang Shutao, who appeared to be the "1% " outside the official figures, was only the result of his wife, also a suspected new case of pneumonia, being admitted to Wuhan Po Oi Hospital.

In the face of such tragedies, the People's Daily ("national human history") on February 4 opened a direct emergency channel to the central guidance team. Related docking help, then synchronizes the operation in the micro-blog platform.

Liang Shutao's case, in the way his wife asked for help, was reported repeatedly, but ultimately failed to fall in time to community coordination.

On February 12, the newspaper of the Wuhan Municipal Committee of the CPC commented that the "epidemic of war" could not be suppressed or depressed, but needed to be "heroic" .

Whether or not we are lucky to survive in the help-seeking channel is engraved sharply and coldly, which distinguishes us from the other side —— The cruel reality.

One

On January 27, Liang Shutao in Hubei Zhongshan Hospital Qiao Estuary Dialysis fever symptoms, CT showed suspected new pneumonia.

As a result, Zhongshan Hospital stopped its five-year weekly "life extension" dialysis. On February 2, Liang Shutao was transferred to the Puai Hospital in Wuhan for Dialysis, but the most urgent thing was the confirmation of new pneumonia. Otherwise, no hospital will be able to meet its dialysis needs.

To add insult to injury, his 68-year-old wife, Cheng Xiaolan, was also suspected of contracting new coronary pneumonia. Family members are required to self-isolation and living in different communities, Liang Shutao couples can only continue to communicate with Luo Jiadun community, urge contact nucleic acid testing.

In severe uremia, dialysis disconnection means "waiting to die. ". Although the situation is critical, but Luo Jiadun community response, only "has been reported, go through the process. ".

Liang Shutao's place in the Guangdian Jiangwan new town residents, began to register its people's Daily and other emergency channels.

Tong Zhiwei, a East China University of Political Science and Law professor who has been collecting information for help and relaying the appeal, put pressure on Liang through his Weibo (ID: Tong Zhiwei) .

After confirming that too many patients could not be treated in time, from suspected to serious illness, or even death, Tong Zhiwei knew only the "waiting" heart.

On Feb. 8, Liang Shutao, who had been on dialysis for seven days, was weak and had little to eat.

When he used his wheelchair to go to the Luojiadun community service center in Jiangwan new town to ask for help again, the community was closed.

On Feb. 8, Liang Shutao howled outside the gated community
Photo: Courtesy of the respondents

Helpless to the limit, Liang Shutao crying outside the community for nearly two hours. Many Jiangwan new city residents on the occasional cure said, from beginning to end, did not see the relevant staff reception or comfort.

Since the departure of the community service centre, Liang Shutao has been seriously ill and has coughed up blood with grief and indignation.

On February 9th, a "turnaround" occurred. Liang Shutao's family has been informed by the Law Ka Tun community that nucleic acid testing can be arranged by the Gutian Street Community Health Service Centre. But when Liang Shutao arrived, he was told that the doctor had left his post and postponed to the morning of the 10th.

The next day, Liang Shutao and his wife arrived at the Gutian Street Community Health Service Centre in advance. After waiting a long time, the docking doctor suddenly informed that the lack of tests required for the throat swab. In response to family enquiries, Luojiadun community explanation is to continue to stay.

Liang Shutao, who is incontinent, can no longer hold on. The family request urgent processing, Luo Jiadun community then suggested Liang Shutao husband and wife to go home first, waiting for notice.

But there was no news. At 1457 hours, Liang Shutao jumped from the 9th floor.

Residents who witnessed the occasional healing sigh that Liang Shutao had difficulty walking, but "too fast" to get over the balcony railing. As if exhausted by his last breath, "he went without hesitation. ".

At 22:00, Liang Shutao's family again for Cheng Xiaolan hospital admission and community negotiations. When questioned about guilt or not, the staff repeatedly and forcefully beat their own chest.

After Liang Shutao committed suicide, his family approached the community
Photo: Courtesy of the respondents

Liang Shutao's story sparked an explosion of discontent in the community.

Jiangwan new city residents on the occasional cure said that the epidemic prevention and control so far, the community has not carried out any screening of the community. Daily public data, real from the residents in the nearby hospital after self-examination feedback, in addition to severe and fever tips, no doubt statistical.

In addition, the community neglected management, has not been able to arrange the admission of serious patients in the community. The community also refused to go through the formalities for volunteers to take the risk of transporting vegetables into the community.

In addition, the security guard resigned and two cases of burglary occurred during the outbreak. Residents are still living in tension with the community and even in "confrontation" .

Two

In contrast to Liang Shutao, Li Guodong and his wife, who are both from Qiaokou District, may be among the "survivors" in the emergency tunnel.

But the admissions process is still fraught and complicated.

On January 27 and 24, Li Guodong and his wife, Ren Fanghua, developed high and low fever respectively. On February 4, Li Guodong was diagnosed with new coronary pneumonia. The hospital advised the community (Po Hong Court) to coordinate bed admission. Ren Fanghua's CT showed multiple (ground-glass) infections in both lungs, suspected of new coronary pneumonia.

Prior to his diagnosis, Li Guodong had been communicating with the Po Hong Court community about hospitalization arrangements, but there was little progress.

On February 5, Li Guodong's emergency help message was forwarded by Tong Zhiwei and attracted attention.

At noon on February 6, the community informed Li Guodong and his wife to go to Wuhan Convention and Exhibition Center Shelter Hospital. But was told by the shelter hospital has not been built, can only go home to quarantine themselves.

February 7 at 20:00, Mr. and Mrs. Li Guodong was informed by the community, rushed to the shelter hospital. Arrive at 2200 hours and queue up until 1 am the next day.

Check through the shelter hospital, Ren Fanghua can be admitted, but Oxygenation has been reduced to 77% , a serious case of new pneumonia, according to regulations can not be admitted.

Because of all the infection, Li Guodong and his wife refused to be accompanied by family members; and his husband developed into serious unattended, so Ren Fanghua decided to give up the shelter hospital.

In view of the special situation of Li Guodong and his wife, Tong Zhiwei continued to follow up. Information of concern and appeal for help has been continuously collected at the family office of Li Guodong's parents.

On August 8, based on Public Opinion Monitoring, Baokangyuan Community Coordination Mr. and Mrs. Li Guodong to Wuhan Guangfa Tumor Hospital, isolation and observation.

But Private Guangfa Cancer Hospital, controlled by Guangfa Securities, has been temporarily requisitioned since February 5, causing cancer patients to be cleared, once into chaos. Basic medical care is not guaranteed.

There is no medical condition for the temporary requisition of the Guangfa Cancer Hospital
Photo: Weibo for help

Mr. and Mrs. Li Guodong face the risk of no medical staff and infusion capacity.

Like Tong Zhiwei, the Blogger Mofei (ID: I am not Qian Ge er) , who is also sorting out the emergency information, can check the situation directly to the central guidance team because of his friends.

On the 11th, the occasional cure will Li Guodong and his wife ask for help information feedback in Mofei, again reported.

On the 12th, Li Guodong and his wife were settled properly. Li Guodong by fixed-point Wuhan Asia Heart General Hospital Admission, Ren Fanghua is admitted to the shelter hospital.

In addition, it is not only new pneumonia patients who are "crowding" in the emergency corridors.

Tang Chang 'an, who lives in the Warm Garden of Baibuting community, suffered a stroke on February 4. CT of the head and lungs shows cerebral infarction and infection. However, the possibility of admission can only be considered after the diagnosis of new coronary pneumonia.

But the community told Tang Chang 'an family members, the daily report detection quota only one.

After urgent help channel registration urged, although the community began to arrange the relevant isolation hospital, but brain follow-up treatment because of new pneumonia test repeatedly blocked.

So, son-in-law Chen Kan will take Tang Chang 'an "live" into the car, every day around the hospital to seek self-help. When resting, then stops at the public toilet side, for the convenience washes gargle.

From February 5 to 11, Chen and his father-in-law, who is seriously ill, traveled to Union hospital five times, Shipping General Hospital and Hankou Hospital three times, and provincial traditional Chinese medicine two times, bauhinia Hospital, East L. Hospital, Wu People's Hospital, central war zone general hospital, Hongji Orthopaedic Hospital once each.

In the end, Chen can for Tang Chang 'an to obtain two nucleic acid testing, are negative. But no hospital will admit a cerebral infarction. "missed the gold (treatment) period, only to return home, through the conservative treatment of drugs, " Chen Kan helpless way.

Three

Tong Zhiwei and Mofei are aware that behind every emergency, there are patients and the intensification of community conflict.

The comprehensive residents'response to the community problems is focused on the lack of investigation and timely assistance, ineffective communication and mediation.

On February 11, the Global Times reported that, after following up on the night of February 9, the scene of the transfer of a severe case of new crown pneumonia in Wuchang District was found to be "lagging, disorganized and disorganized"  Street and community workers without car-following services, leading to severe patients emotional loss, "very bad practice. ".

On the same day, leaders of the Wuchang District government went to the Intensive Care Unit of Tongji Hospital and apologized in person to the representatives of the patients.

But the occasional cure for many people is that, under executive orders, the performance of the community is actually quite different. And the inability to do anything about it. Especially when it comes to the severity of a family-style infection.

Have you ever received a request for help from the community workers at Wui Fuk Yuen, Hanyang District. Shūmei and his wife, both residents of Huifuyuan, showed lung infection but did not take nucleic acid tests, while Shūmei's mother in law was diagnosed with new crown pneumonia and her younger brother was suspected of infection, leaving their 19 year old son safely in isolation.

In response, Huifuyuan community staff said that although the report has been expedited, but "waiting for the boss is very slow" . It is hoped that through the emergency help channel and the attention of public opinion on Weibo, it will help the Shūmei family to carry out the examination and treatment as soon as possible.

After the public sentiment fermented, Hanyang District received a notification letter from the Wuhan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China's Internet Information Office, requesting that, in accordance with the requirements of the prevention and Control Headquarters, the report should be reported to the main leaders of the District Party Committee and District government to check on the Shūmei family infection incident, and that the results of the handling of the case should be returned within 24 hours.

After Urgent Appeal for help arouses public opinion attention, the supervisory office of relevant department intervenes
Photo: Weibo for help

The SHŪMEI family was rushed to arrange a nucleic acid test. But unfortunately, Shūmei's brother did not belong to Huifuyuan community, failed to timely detection and treatment, and eventually died.

Huifuyuan community insiders on the occasional cure said that, in addition to seven in-service personnel, superior Qinduankou Street, only two people of average age of 60-year-old leaders to assist in the work. Reporting Information, door-to-door delivery of food, comfort patients, coordination of hospital and other all the pressure, are forced to bear.

In addition, for emergency help information, once the network spread or reported to the Central Guidance Group, the solution will be issued supervision documents. But on the policy directive, each street is allowed to provide only a few emergency places.

And the street leaders, will only sit in the air-conditioned room every day, shouting slogans. Therefore, whenever the tragedy occurs, the public's resentment and anger are directed at the community, the community can only "take the blame" in the end.

In essence, Wuhan has not set up an efficient coordination system from top to bottom. Murphy said that even today, the situation is still close to a "paper-based office" , from the prevention and Control Command of the fine command, street personnel simply can not implement. Coupled with the lack of resources and layout of chaos, the relevant competent departments and agencies, back and forth to pass the buck, "can not move. ".

The aforementioned residents of Jiangwan new town, that is to say, occasionally cured, when they first sought help for Liang Shutao, the community asked them to look for streets, the streets were told to transfer to the district, and the district requested to contact the mayor's hotline; the Mayor's hotline replied to arrange for district-by-district processing, when they finally returned to the community, the community had to respond and report again.

On February 13th the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided that Ying Yong, the mayor of Shanghai, should be replaced as party secretary of Hubei Province and Wang Zhonglin, party secretary of Jinan, as Party secretary of Wuhan.

Four

Personnel adjustment may lead to changes in prevention and control. Tong Zhiwei and Mofei are also hoping that the number of urgent requests for help will be reduced or even no longer needed.

So far, the proportion of emergency information collected on the network platform is difficult to be counted.

The occasional cure from the people's Daily volunteer hotline learned that since February 4, the People's Daily all-media platform to accept tens of thousands of emergency relief information.

Among them, only through the wechat and information channels connected by the contact person Wang bore (13126806707) , collected and reported more than 4000 cases of emergency information, and helped to solve the active feedback of more than 1000 cases of patient testing, hospital admission needs.

In addition, People's Daily volunteers expressed the hope that the Wuhan Community can take the initiative to link up with People's Daily channels for help, and report urgent needs in a timely manner, so as to jointly enhance work efficiency.

Of course, volunteers, as well as Tong Zhiwei and Murphy, have gone through too much information processing to be told that the patient has passed away.

And when forced to seek emergency help, patients and their families are also under unspeakable pressure.

Tong said that in many cases, patients seeking help were asked to inform the bloggers who had forwarded their help messages before receiving a community promise to arrange urgent testing or admission to hospital, and to delete their micro blogs to eliminate the influence of public opinion.

After verifying the relevant information and sending it to the medical staff, Murphy worried that one of the key reasons for the intensive emergency assistance was also the "loss" of front-line medical staff in the battle of the epidemic, that makes it difficult for medical resources to follow up in time.

On February 14, the National Health Commission announced 1,716 confirmed cases (6 deaths) among medical personnel across the country.

At the same time, as a front-line operator handling calls for occasional cure, suspected cases are "much more critical, much more hypercritical" -- "everyone is alive" , as it were.

Li Guodong, Ren Fanghua, can it be possible that, Chen Kan.

(for more good writing, click "read the original")

By Zuo Yi
Editor in Chief: Li Shanshan
Cover photo: People's Daily

— Tips —

Our new book, between life and death, has been published
Can recognize the Qr code purchase in the picture below

Occasional Cure

to-cure-sometimes
——
Of People and disease, aging, death
The way we deal with each other

Heal occasionally | always help | always comfort

But the admissions process is still fraught and complicated.

On January 27 and 24, Li Guodong and his wife, Ren Fanghua, developed high and low fever respectively. On February 4, Li Guodong was diagnosed with new coronary pneumonia. The hospital advised the community (Po Hong Court) to coordinate bed admission. Ren Fanghua's CT showed multiple (ground-glass) infections in both lungs, suspected of new coronary pneumonia.

Prior to his diagnosis, Li Guodong had been communicating with the Po Hong Court community about hospitalization arrangements, but there was little progress.

On February 5, Li Guodong's emergency help message was forwarded by Tong Zhiwei and attracted attention.

At noon on February 6, the community informed Li Guodong and his wife to go to Wuhan Convention and Exhibition Center Shelter Hospital. But was told by the shelter hospital has not been built, can only go home to quarantine themselves.

February 7 at 20:00, Mr. and Mrs. Li Guodong was informed by the community, rushed to the shelter hospital. Arrive at 2200 hours and queue up until 1 am the next day.

Check through the shelter hospital, Ren Fanghua can be admitted, but Oxygenation has been reduced to 77% , a serious case of new pneumonia, according to regulations can not be admitted.

Because of all the infection, Li Guodong and his wife refused to be accompanied by family members; and his husband developed into serious unattended, so Ren Fanghua decided to give up the shelter hospital.

In view of the special situation of Li Guodong and his wife, Tong Zhiwei continued to follow up. Information of concern and appeal for help has been continuously collected at the family office of Li Guodong's parents.

On August 8, based on Public Opinion Monitoring, Baokangyuan Community Coordination Mr. and Mrs. Li Guodong to Wuhan Guangfa Tumor Hospital, isolation and observation.

But Private Guangfa Cancer Hospital, controlled by Guangfa Securities, has been temporarily requisitioned since February 5, causing cancer patients to be cleared, once into chaos. Basic medical care is not guaranteed.

There is no medical condition for the temporary requisition of the Guangfa Cancer Hospital
Photo: Weibo for help

There is no medical condition for the temporary requisition of the Guangfa Cancer Hospital

Photo: Weibo for help

Mr. and Mrs. Li Guodong face the risk of no medical staff and infusion capacity.

Like Tong Zhiwei, the Blogger Mofei (ID: I am not Qian Ge er) , who is also sorting out the emergency information, can check the situation directly to the central guidance team because of his friends.

On the 11th, the occasional cure will Li Guodong and his wife ask for help information feedback in Mofei, again reported.

On the 12th, Li Guodong and his wife were settled properly. Li Guodong by fixed-point Wuhan Asia Heart General Hospital Admission, Ren Fanghua is admitted to the shelter hospital.

In addition, it is not only new pneumonia patients who are "crowding" in the emergency corridors.

Tang Chang 'an, who lives in the Warm Garden of Baibuting community, suffered a stroke on February 4. CT of the head and lungs shows cerebral infarction and infection. However, the possibility of admission can only be considered after the diagnosis of new coronary pneumonia.

But the community told Tang Chang 'an family members, the daily report detection quota only one.

After urgent help channel registration urged, although the community began to arrange the relevant isolation hospital, but brain follow-up treatment because of new pneumonia test repeatedly blocked.

So, son-in-law Chen Kan will take Tang Chang 'an "live" into the car, every day around the hospital to seek self-help. When resting, then stops at the public toilet side, for the convenience washes gargle.

From February 5 to 11, Chen and his father-in-law, who is seriously ill, traveled to Union hospital five times, Shipping General Hospital and Hankou Hospital three times, and provincial traditional Chinese medicine two times, bauhinia Hospital, East L. Hospital, Wu People's Hospital, central war zone general hospital, Hongji Orthopaedic Hospital once each.

In the end, Chen can for Tang Chang 'an to obtain two nucleic acid testing, are negative. But no hospital will admit a cerebral infarction. "missed the gold (treatment) period, only to return home, through the conservative treatment of drugs, " Chen Kan helpless way.

Three

Tong Zhiwei and Mofei are aware that behind every emergency, there are patients and the intensification of community conflict.

The comprehensive residents'response to the community problems is focused on the lack of investigation and timely assistance, ineffective communication and mediation.

On February 11, the Global Times reported that, after following up on the night of February 9, the scene of the transfer of a severe case of new crown pneumonia in Wuchang District was found to be "lagging, disorganized and disorganized"  Street and community workers without car-following services, leading to severe patients emotional loss, "very bad practice. ".

On the same day, leaders of the Wuchang District government went to the Intensive Care Unit of Tongji Hospital and apologized in person to the representatives of the patients.

But the occasional cure for many people is that, under executive orders, the performance of the community is actually quite different. And the inability to do anything about it. Especially when it comes to the severity of a family-style infection.

Have you ever received a request for help from the community workers at Wui Fuk Yuen, Hanyang District. Shūmei and his wife, both residents of Huifuyuan, showed lung infection but did not take nucleic acid tests, while Shūmei's mother in law was diagnosed with new crown pneumonia and her younger brother was suspected of infection, leaving their 19 year old son safely in isolation.

In response, Huifuyuan community staff said that although the report has been expedited, but "waiting for the boss is very slow" . It is hoped that through the emergency help channel and the attention of public opinion on Weibo, it will help the Shūmei family to carry out the examination and treatment as soon as possible.

After the public sentiment fermented, Hanyang District received a notification letter from the Wuhan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China's Internet Information Office, requesting that, in accordance with the requirements of the prevention and Control Headquarters, the report should be reported to the main leaders of the District Party Committee and District government to check on the Shūmei family infection incident, and that the results of the handling of the case should be returned within 24 hours.

After Urgent Appeal for help arouses public opinion attention, the supervisory office of relevant department intervenes
Photo: Weibo for help

The SHŪMEI family was rushed to arrange a nucleic acid test. But unfortunately, Shūmei's brother did not belong to Huifuyuan community, failed to timely detection and treatment, and eventually died.

Huifuyuan community insiders on the occasional cure said that, in addition to seven in-service personnel, superior Qinduankou Street, only two people of average age of 60-year-old leaders to assist in the work. Reporting Information, door-to-door delivery of food, comfort patients, coordination of hospital and other all the pressure, are forced to bear.

In addition, for emergency help information, once the network spread or reported to the Central Guidance Group, the solution will be issued supervision documents. But on the policy directive, each street is allowed to provide only a few emergency places.

And the street leaders, will only sit in the air-conditioned room every day, shouting slogans. Therefore, whenever the tragedy occurs, the public's resentment and anger are directed at the community, the community can only "take the blame" in the end.

In essence, Wuhan has not set up an efficient coordination system from top to bottom. Murphy said that even today, the situation is still close to a "paper-based office" , from the prevention and Control Command of the fine command, street personnel simply can not implement. Coupled with the lack of resources and layout of chaos, the relevant competent departments and agencies, back and forth to pass the buck, "can not move. ".

The aforementioned residents of Jiangwan new town, that is to say, occasionally cured, when they first sought help for Liang Shutao, the community asked them to look for streets, the streets were told to transfer to the district, and the district requested to contact the mayor's hotline; the Mayor's hotline replied to arrange for district-by-district processing, when they finally returned to the community, the community had to respond and report again.

On February 13th the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided that Ying Yong, the mayor of Shanghai, should be replaced as party secretary of Hubei Province and Wang Zhonglin, party secretary of Jinan, as Party secretary of Wuhan.

Tong Zhiwei and Mofei are aware that behind every emergency, there are patients and the intensification of community conflict.

The comprehensive residents'response to the community problems is focused on the lack of investigation and timely assistance, ineffective communication and mediation.

On February 11, the Global Times reported that, after following up on the night of February 9, the scene of the transfer of a severe case of new crown pneumonia in Wuchang District was found to be "lagging, disorganized and disorganized"  Street and community workers without car-following services, leading to severe patients emotional loss, "very bad practice. ".

On the same day, leaders of the Wuchang District government went to the Intensive Care Unit of Tongji Hospital and apologized in person to the representatives of the patients.

After Urgent Appeal for help arouses public opinion attention, the supervisory office of relevant department intervenes

The SHŪMEI family was rushed to arrange a nucleic acid test. But unfortunately, Shūmei's brother did not belong to Huifuyuan community, failed to timely detection and treatment, and eventually died.

Huifuyuan community insiders on the occasional cure said that, in addition to seven in-service personnel, superior Qinduankou Street, only two people of average age of 60-year-old leaders to assist in the work. And the street leaders, will only sit in the air-conditioned room every day, shouting slogans. Therefore, whenever the tragedy occurs, the public's resentment and anger are directed at the community, the community can only "take the blame" in the end.

In essence, Wuhan has not set up an efficient coordination system from top to bottom. Murphy said that even today, the situation is still close to a "paper-based office" , from the prevention and Control Command of the fine command, street personnel simply can not implement. Coupled with the lack of resources and layout of chaos, the relevant competent departments and agencies, back and forth to pass the buck, "can not move. ".

The aforementioned residents of Jiangwan new town, that is to say, occasionally cured, when they first sought help for Liang Shutao, the community asked them to look for streets, the streets were told to transfer to the district, and the district requested to contact the mayor's hotline; the Mayor's hotline replied to arrange for district-by-district processing, when they finally returned to the community, the community had to respond and report again.

On February 13th the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided that Ying Yong, the mayor of Shanghai, should be replaced as party secretary of Hubei Province and Wang Zhonglin, party secretary of Jinan, as Party secretary of Wuhan.

Four

Personnel adjustment may lead to changes in prevention and control. Tong Zhiwei and Mofei are also hoping that the number of urgent requests for help will be reduced or even no longer needed.

So far, the proportion of emergency information collected on the network platform is difficult to be counted.

The occasional cure from the people's Daily volunteer hotline learned that since February 4, the People's Daily all-media platform to accept tens of thousands of emergency relief information.

Among them, only through the wechat and information channels connected by the contact person Wang bore (13126806707) , collected and reported more than 4000 cases of emergency information, and helped to solve the active feedback of more than 1000 cases of patient testing, hospital admission needs.

In addition, People's Daily volunteers expressed the hope that the Wuhan Community can take the initiative to link up with People's Daily channels for help, and report urgent needs in a timely manner, so as to jointly enhance work efficiency.

Of course, volunteers, as well as Tong Zhiwei and Murphy, have gone through too much information processing to be told that the patient has passed away.

And when forced to seek emergency help, patients and their families are also under unspeakable pressure.

Tong said that in many cases, patients seeking help were asked to inform the bloggers who had forwarded their help messages before receiving a community promise to arrange urgent testing or admission to hospital, and to delete their micro blogs to eliminate the influence of public opinion.

After verifying the relevant information and sending it to the medical staff, Murphy worried that one of the key reasons for the intensive emergency assistance was also the "loss" of front-line medical staff in the battle of the epidemic, that makes it difficult for medical resources to follow up in time.

On February 14, the National Health Commission announced 1,716 confirmed cases (6 deaths) among medical personnel across the country.

At the same time, as a front-line operator handling calls for occasional cure, suspected cases are "much more critical, much more hypercritical" -- "everyone is alive" , as it were.

Li Guodong, Ren Fanghua, can it be possible that, Chen Kan.

Personnel adjustment may lead to changes in prevention and control. Tong Zhiwei and Mofei are also hoping that the number of urgent requests for help will be reduced or even no longer needed.

So far, the proportion of emergency information collected on the network platform is difficult to be counted.

The occasional cure from the people's Daily volunteer hotline learned that since February 4, the People's Daily all-media platform to accept tens of thousands of emergency relief information.

Among them, only through the wechat and information channels connected by the contact person Wang bore (13126806707) , collected and reported more than 4000 cases of emergency information, and helped to solve the active feedback of more than 1000 cases of patient testing, hospital admission needs.

In addition, People's Daily volunteers expressed the hope that the Wuhan Community can take the initiative to link up with People's Daily channels for help, and report urgent needs in a timely manner, so as to jointly enhance work efficiency.

Of course, volunteers, as well as Tong Zhiwei and Murphy, have gone through too much information processing to be told that the patient has passed away.

And when forced to seek emergency help, patients and their families are also under unspeakable pressure.

Tong said that in many cases, patients seeking help were asked to inform the bloggers who had forwarded their help messages before receiving a community promise to arrange urgent testing or admission to hospital, and to delete their micro blogs to eliminate the influence of public opinion.

After verifying the relevant information and sending it to the medical staff, Murphy worried that one of the key reasons for the intensive emergency assistance was also the "loss" of front-line medical staff in the battle of the epidemic, that makes it difficult for medical resources to follow up in time.

On February 14, the National Health Commission announced 1,716 confirmed cases (6 deaths) among medical personnel across the country.

At the same time, as a front-line operator handling calls for occasional cure, suspected cases are "much more critical, much more hypercritical" -- "everyone is alive" , as it were.

Li Guodong, Ren Fanghua, can it be possible that, Chen Kan.
